titleStmt.title: Theologia Germanica. Or, Mysticall divinitie : a little golden manuall briefly discovering the mysteries, sublimity, perfection and simplicity of Christianity, in belief and practise. Written above 250 years since in high Dutch, & for its worth translated into Latine, and printed at Antwarp, 1558. Whereto is added definitions theologicall and philosophicall. Also a treatise of the soul, and other additions not before printed.
titleStmt.author: Randall, Giles, translator.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Sweeting, at the Angell in Popes head Alley,

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Giles Randall, of the Latin translation of the original High Dutch.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Angell in Popes head Alley
